item.title: Boids in Three.js, Part Zero: Setting Up
item.description: The first in a series of posts on creating a boids-type flocking simulation using Three.js. This post covers initial project setup, including bootstrapping Three.js, creating a geometry for the individual boids, and wiring up performance counters and a GUI.
